title: Apartment with views of the Magnolia Trees/55+ Adult Community
posting_body: ['Victoria Gardens...', 'Our Senior Community is just what you are looking for, if you are 55 yrs or older.', ' We offer 1 Bedroom Apartments designed for an independent lifestyle.', '<URL> (visit our website for additional information and rental criteria)', 'Apartment – Amenities - Available in September', 'Open Floor Plan with New Carpet in the Livingroom and Bedroom', 'Full-size Modern Kitchen with New Cabinets', 'Walk-in Pantry', 'Electric Appliances', 'New Vinyl in Kitchen, Dining Area and Bath', 'Built-In Bookshelf in Livingroom', 'Large Closets / Linen Closet', 'Internet/Cable Ready', 'Large Patio', '1 Assigned Parking Space', 'No Smoking', 'Community – Amenities', 'Elevator in each Building', '2 Laundry Room Facilities', 'Clubhouse, Library, and Billiard Room', 'Courtyard with Sitting Areas / Beautiful Gazebo', 'Park-Like Landscaped Areas', 'On-site Management Team', 'On-site Maintenance / 24-Hr Maintenance', 'Enjoy a breath of fresh air and sit among mature trees at this peaceful garden setting community.', 'Socialize in the beautifully decorated and comfortable clubhouse; enjoy a game of billiards with friends and neighbors.', ' If some quiet time is what you require, retreat to its reading room and library with your favorite novel or catch up on current events from your newspaper.', 'Walking distance to the Irvington Farmers Market, coffee shops, supermarket, restaurants and other services.', "It's a quick trip to the Pacific Commons Shopping Center and the Fremont Hub.", 'Near Hwy 880 and 680.', 'Rent $1895 (1 year lease)', 'Utilities $65 (monthly flat rate for: electricity, gas, water and trash)', 'Security Deposit $800 (on approved credit)', 'Application Fee per Adult $40', 'Leasing office: 4243 Laurel Street, Fremont', 'show contact info', 'office', 'Office Hours: 9a to 6p Monday - Friday.', 'Closed Saturday and Sunday', 'All rents, deposits, leasing terms and availability are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call us for current rental rates, availability, deposits and leasing terms.']
